Commands.Name: website
Commands.Title: Website
Commands.Description: Did you know that MMCC has a website with a lot of useful information?

Commands.Name: donate
Commands.Summary: Provides info about how to donate to MMCC
Commands.Title: Donate to MMCC
Commands.Description: Modded Minecraft Club is expensive to run. We have a monthly dedicated server bill, along with a yearly domain fee and occasional miscellaneous expenses. As such, we accept donations through our store to keep the server alive.

Commands.Name: forum
Commands.Title: Forum
Commands.Description: Did you know that MMCC has a forum where you can look for a team, report issues and more?

Commands.Name: stats
Commands.Title: Stats
Commands.Description: Did you know that MMCC has a web app where you can check out statistics such as player count and TPS for each of the servers?

Commands.Name: wiki
Commands.Title: Wiki
Commands.Description: Did you know that MMCC has a wiki where you can find most important information about the server, as well as answers to common questions?

Commands.Name: claiming
Commands.Summary: Provides info about how to claim land on MMCC servers
Commands.Title: Land claiming
Commands.Description: Learn how to claim land on the server at the link below.

Commands.Name: rules
Commands.Title: Server rules
Commands.Description: In order to keep Modded Minecraft Club a more orderly, calm, and happy place, we have instituted several rules. These rules are what we believe to be the minimum required to create a community of the type we intend to create. You can learn about the rules at the link below.
